entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 12:30 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
Temperature: 7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 6.7°C
Wind: SW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 9 except 13 inland.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog. Amount 2 mm except 10 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 9 except 13 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or drizzle. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain or drizzle. Fog. Amount 5 to 10 mm except 20 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 7 except 11 inland.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle and fog changing to a few showers in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 7 except 11 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
